description._content: Description: Old F.E.C. tanks on the Maidan at Fields, now used as a water reservoir. No.13, the Fields Manager's bungalow, can be seen on the left of the photograph. Description: Suspension bridge built mainly of oil-pipe to carry main collecting line from Naftak area over a ravine on the way to Tembi. The old B.O.C. tanks are in the background. Location: Tembi, Persia Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/714 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
